event.title: OSCA Nairobi Open Source Challenge
event.metaDesc: A four week challenge to encourage contribution to open source projects
event.content: The Open Source Challenge 2022 aims to support the tech ecosystem in Kenya to contribute to open source projects. Each participant records open source contributions made by submitting links to merged pull requests. At the end of the challenge, the top 5 contributors get rewarded with internet data to support their learning/work and a digital certificate that they can add to their collection or resume. The challenge is open to all participants and is open to all contributions.
